thread.section_title: Fiix Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fiix | fiixsoftware.com
thread.title: Reg

author: Reg
title: Reg
text:
This software is working extremely well for us. We are a small, semi-rural water district located in Western Washington.
With a limited budget it was important for us to find a comprehensive solution for assigning and tracking maintenance tasks at a reasonable cost.
The FIIX software has more than filled the bill. It has capabilities that exceed our needs at a very reasonable cost. Once you get used to the conventions, the software is user friendly and easy to use.
We are particularly pleased with the report writer module.
